divs: Sighting DetailsI see these ufo's about every night mostly in the east and south . But tonight they were NNE&E and i even ask my 7yr old grandson . Too come out look at them and i pointed to them ask him did he see them. Move he said yes we looking at them with the naked eye . I've seen them so many times i can petty much look up spot one because satlights don't wobble airplanes have nav lights. I don.t excited about seeing them in the night sky but if one land near me i will walk to it knock on door when door open's it will be the first. (UFO HIJACKING IN HISTORY !!!) I'M just in wrong place . I don't lose sight of them ijust get tired of standing out there watching them.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Moultrie
There were no other sightings in Moultrie on or around June 15th 2012
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: when i spotted them they were sitting there like stars then they move and return .
